snippet: The family of the skipper of a British yacht found upturned in the sea a week after it went missing said Saturday they are shocked and saddened after the vessel's life raft was found unused....

headline.print_headline: Family 'Saddened' as UK Yachtsmen Search Cancelled
headline.main: Family 'Saddened' as UK Yachtsmen Search Cancelled

lead_paragraph: The family of the skipper of a British yacht found upturned in the sea a week after it went missing said Saturday they are shocked and saddened after the vessel's life raft was found unused.
